title: Honey and sultana-glazed croissants

default: 2 ready-made croissants, sliced in half lengthways

steps: Place the croissants cut-side up on a non-stick baking sheet. Drizzle with honey and sprinkle over the sultanas.
Transfer to the oven and bake for five minutes, or until warmed through.
To serve, place the warm croissants onto serving plates and dust with icing sugar.
